text.text_translated: Gabriela saw different ways of life. Her team worked in a different way. She decided to talk to them. She had an open talk. She asked about their feelings. She asked about how she led them. Her team was happy she asked. They said they did not know this way to work. This was their normal way of working. They liked to make their own plans. They liked to have creative freedom. Gabriela told them exactly what to do. They felt she did not believe in them. They saw Gabriela felt bad. This was when they tried to say no to her decisions. Or when they tried to change her decisions. They could explain this. They always worked like this.

best_attempt.text_translated: Gabriela saw cultural differences. Her team worked in a different way. She decided to talk to them. She had an open talk. She asked about their feelings. She asked about her leadership. Her team was happy she asked. They said they were not used to being told what to do. This was their normal way of working. They liked to make their own plans. They liked to have creative freedom. Gabriela told them exactly what to do. They felt she did not trust them to do their job well. They saw Gabriela took it personally. This was when they tried to challenge her decisions. Or when they tried to change her decisions. They could explain this. They always worked like this.
